question: L&T Technology Services and IIT-Kanpur recently signed a MoU to conduct research on which of the following field?
explanation: L&T Technology Services Limited (LTTS) and IIT-Kanpur recently signed a MoU to conduct research in the area of industrial and infrastructure cybersecurity. They together will set up a Center of Excellence (CoE) in the IIT Kanpur campus and conduct the research work.
